data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Three Crowns of the Sailor: City of Pirates (1983), The Holy Mountain (1973), Night Across the Street (2012), Cremaster 3 (2002), Goodbye to Language (2014), Fando and Lis (1968), Malpertuis (1971), Love Torn in a Dream (2000), Prospero's Books (1991), The Sword and the Rose (2010)

Original name: Les Trois couronnes du matelot

Genre: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

Country: France

Duration: 117 min.

Story: In this classically surreal fantasy, a sailor, known for telling tales, sees a student killing his teacher and decides to spin a few yarns for him. He tells the boy of his many adventures in exotic South American ports where he visited opium dens and stayed in cathouses. In such dark, dreamlike places, the sailor meets many strange, mystical characters.
